mapper.insert: --#7. 자유게시판 신규글 등록 테스트 INSERT INTO article (articleid, writer, boardid, subject, content, regdate, hitcount, passwd, group_no, level_no, order_no) VALUES (article_id_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{boardId}, #{subject}, #{content}, SYSDATE, '0', #{passwd}, article_id_seq.CURRVAL, 0, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT articleid, writer, boardid, subject, content, regdate, hitcount, passwd, group_no, level_no, order_no FROM article ORDER BY articleid DESC
SELECT articleid, writer, boardid, subject, content, regdate, hitcount, passwd, group_no, level_no, order_no FROM article WHERE subject LIKE '%' || #{searchSubject} || '%' ORDER BY articleid DESC
SELECT articleid, writer, boardid, subject, content, regdate, hitcount, passwd, group_no, level_no, order_no FROM article WHERE hitcount >=20 ORDER BY hitcount DESC
SELECT articleid, boardid, writer, subject, content, regdate, group_no, order_no, hitcount FROM article WHERE articleid = #{articleId}
SELECT writer, content, passwd, regdate, group_no, level_no, order_no FROM article WHERE level_no = 1 AND group_no = #{groupNo} ORDER BY order_no ASC
SELECT NVL(COUNT(articleid), 0) AS commentCount FROM article WHERE group_no = #{groupNo} AND level_no >= 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article (articleid, subject, writer, content, passwd, boardid, group_no, regdate, level_no, order_no) VALUES (article_id_seq.NEXTVAL, #{subject}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{passwd}, #{boardId}, #{groupNo}, SYSDATE, 1, (SELECT MAX(order_no) + 1 FROM article WHERE boardid = #{boardId} AND group_no = #{groupNo}))
mapper.select: SELECT articleid, subject, writer, regdate, hitcount, boardId , level_no FROM (SELECT CEIL(rownum / #{pageParams.elementSize}) request_page, articleid, subject, writer, regdate, hitcount, boardId , level_no FROM (SELECT articleid, subject, writer, regdate, hitcount, boardId , level_no FROM article WHERE order_no = 0 ORDER BY group_no DESC, order_no ASC, level_no ASC)) WHERE request_page = #{pageParams.requestPage} ORDER BY boardId DESC
